Features: * [DDR5 Memory Technology] - Utilizes the latest DDR5 technology for faster speeds, higher bandwidth, and improved efficiency compared to previous generations.

* [Intel XMP & AMD Expo Ready] - Unlock faster load times, smoother gameplay, and improved multitasking capabilities with the combined power of Intel XMP or AMD Expo compatibility and high-performance DDR5 memory.

* [Dynamic RGB Lighting] - Customize and synchronize your PC’s color and lighting effects, without the need for additional cables or connectors, using the supported Asus Aura Sync®, Gigabyte RGB Fusion®, MSI Mystic Light Sync® and ASRock Polychrome Sync® software.
